title: DegenHive - 🤝｜start-here
html:
#  Hello Degens 👋! Welcome to DegenHive!  🧙   🎮

We’re thrilled to have you join the first-ever DeFi-powered *composable-identity framework*, designed to launch and manage AI characters as dynamic NFTs composable across dapps. 🌐  

📢 **NOTE: Our journey is just beginning. Follow the steps below to prepare for the exciting adventures ahead!**  ⬇️ 🛣️

> "*To breathe life into **memes**, we first embrace the spirit of the **degens***." - A Mystic of the Hive swarm 🧙


**1️⃣ LEARN 📖**

•   This is the first critical step towards becoming a true** Degen Guardian** and preparing to explore the vast opportunities of DegenHive once it launches! ✨
•  Begin your journey and earn your @workers role by completing the Galxe quests here: 
https://dashboard.galxe.com/quest/DegenHive

•  Enhance your knowledge by going through our docs: https://guide.degenhive.ai/  📚

👉 **Become a delegate and feature Your Content on Our Main Feed**
•    **Great Content Creators Wanted**If you’re a talented crypto or AI content creator, fill out this form to have your content featured on our main feed - https://forms.gle/v1MgFxcF2e9iUzcg6

3️⃣ **VAMPIRES 🧛 AND INFUSION PHASE** 🍯 

DegenHive is set for a fair launch, ensuring community involvement and leading the price discovery for BEE and HIVE tokens. Here’s how our launch process unfolds:

**•   Vampire Attack:** Liquidity Providers from existing Sui DEXes will be incentivized to migrate their positions to DegenHive in exchange for HIVE rewards.
**•   Infusion phase:**  This phase enables the community to fairly discover the price of BEE and HIVE tokens.
   
👉 ** For detailed overview, refer to our docs: **https://guide.degenhive.ai/introduction/fair-launch

We’re excited for our journey together and look forward to the ways you will help shape and govern this community!

***For the degens. By the degens. With the degens.*** 🌟


**PLEASE NOTE: **There is no current presale, and there will be no pre-sale! DegenHive will have a fair launch, with launch date to be shared soon. Beware of any claims otherwise; they may be scams. Stay safe, degens! 🚨🔒
